author: Steve Jobs
quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: I want to put a ding in the universe.

author: Walt Disney
quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Stay hungry, stay foolish.

author: Theordore Roosevelt
quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

author: Ronald Reagan
quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.

author: Theordore Roosevelt
quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.

author: Aristotle
quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.

author: John Lennon
quote: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.

author: Lou Holtz
quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win.

author: Conrad Hall
quote: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
